title: My Account is Suspended
body:
my account has been suspended
Can you return my account?
Please, I have not been able to play with my friends since you suspended my account
Since then I have not played the game and some of my friends have left the game but I want to go back and play the game please re-open my account again
I beg you
In order for my friends and I to come back together and enjoy 
 the game, it is a long time since the account was suspended

replies.body:
I'm not from Player Behavior, but I also can't really say if you can or can't get your account unbanned since it depends on why you were originally banned.

If you want to appeal your ban, you should [send a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our Player Behavior team and we can discuss it further with you.
